Crimes.Legal_Issue: Can a removal order be executed against a person on probation without violating s. 50(1)(a) of the Immigration Act?
Crimes.Procedural_Stage: Judicial review application and motion for stay
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Removal order stayed pending judicial review or Court of Appeal decision
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Section 50(1)(a) prohibits executing a removal order if it directly results in contravening another judicial order, such as a probation order
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Executing the removal order would violate the probation order requiring monthly reporting
Crimes.Court_Result: Stay granted based on conflict between removal order and probation order
Crimes.Pending_Relief_or_Application: Stay of removal pending resolution of judicial review

Crimes.Crime_Name: Being a Danger to the Public under Immigration Act
Crimes.Violation_Type: Danger to the public under immigration law
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Can a removal order be executed against an individual on probation without violating s. 50(1)(a) of the Immigration Act?
Crimes.Application_Facts: Applicant on probation for narcotics conviction; removal order issued
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Removal order stayed due to conflict with probation order
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Non-citizen subject to removal while on probation
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Convicted of drug offenses and declared a danger to the public
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Execution of removal order would contravene judicial probation order
Crimes.Outcome: Stay granted pending judicial review or appellate decision

Crimes.Crime_Name: Possession of Narcotics for the Purpose of Trafficking
Crimes.Accusation: Possession of narcotics for the purpose of trafficking
Crimes.Procedural_Stage: Motion for stay of removal during judicial review
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Probation order, removal order, prior court decisions
Crimes.Basis_for_Decision: Conflict between removal order and ongoing probation obligations
Crimes.Risk_Nexus: Public safety concerns linked to drug trafficking conviction
Crimes.Applicant_Status: Individual under probation and facing removal
